response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your business. This exceptional item is valued at $1,200,000 to me, reflecting its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. Given your expertise and the potential synergies between our offerings, I am confident that this investment would be highly beneficial for you.

To make this opportunity more accessible, I am offering you the chance to acquire this product at a special introductory price. My proposal is to extend a 10% discount on the original value, making it available to you for $1,080,000. This exclusive offer is valid for the next 7 days, after which the price will revert to its full value.

Please consider this offer carefully, and let's discuss how we can collaborate to maximize the value of this product for your business. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1080000}
